document.text:
From: 
To:'
Subject: RE: Draft RTC 
Date: Fri, 20 Aug 2021 12:41:02 +0000 
Attachments: Maxwell RTC v8.docx 
Thanks! And really, no problem at all. I'm going to be on leave for the next two weeks, so I probably won't send your 
comments to until I'm back —  so no rush at all. I've attached the latest version, just so you have the most 
recent one. Thank you so much for your help on this case! 
I do know — he's really fantastic. I used to work with him at Civil Appellate, and he's talked a lot about how great 
his clerkship was. Small world! 
From: 
Sent: Friday, August 20, 2021 5:40 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Draft RTC 
Got it, thank you. I'm so sorry for the delay in feedback. I did a quick scan a while back and thought it looked great, but 
will do a closer read and get any comments to you by the end of next week (and you can blame me if you raise them with 
the PC Chiefs!). Thanks for all of your great and hard work on this case. 
P.S. Do you know He asked me if I knew you a while ago, but I forgot to reach out about it.Mnd I both 
clerked for the same judge. He is wonderful. 
From: 
Sent: Thursda Au_• ust 19 202110:52 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Draft RTC 
Hi
No problem. I sent it to the PC Chiefs yesterday, and it's headed toMfter that. We aren't filing it until November, 
though —  we just want to have it out of the way, as we turn to MILs. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 2021 5:25 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Draft RTC 
Thanks, So sorry — could you please remind me when you're sending this to the PC Chiefs and when you're 
supposed to file it? Thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Frida Au • ust 6  2021 7:29 PM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Draft RTC 
EFTA00029163

I hope all's well! Draft RTC in Maxwell attached. The team is going to have comments, I'm sure, as will the chiefs. If you 
like, I can send you wherever we land. And, of course, I'd welcome any comments you might have too, as an expert on 
this. 
From: 
Sent: Frida Au ust 6  2021 7:28 PM 
Subject: Draft RTC 
Hi all, 
Attached is a draft RTC for your review. I've left in some comment bubbles to flag some of the judgment calls, and I'm 
going to clean up the cites/do a citecheck. 
Looking forward to your comments. 
..hanks 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00029164
